Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize team's average story points per sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_count
Description: Minimize the number of active blockers

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize number of completed features per release

Name: minimize_sprint_overrun
Description: Minimize actual effort exceeding estimated effort

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize productive use of available worker time

Name: minimize_backlog_churn
Description: Minimize changes to Product Backlog priority during sprint

Name: maximize_test_coverage
Description: Maximize percentage of tasks with test documentation

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failure
Description: Minimize number of sprints failing to achieve their goal

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize stakeholder influence satisfaction from Sprint Reviews

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Minimize accumulation of unresolved technical issues
